Text: RE Merchants Exchangegood Andy I look forward to hearing from you Original Message From Zipper Andy mailtoAndy NRONcom Sent Friday May PM To Subject RE Merchants Exchange Steve Thank you for the diagram and sorry for not getting back to you sooner We are evaluating how Merchants Exchange and Enron could work together and will contact you when we are ready to move the dialogue forward Thanks Andy Zipper

FW Merchants ExchangeHere is another copy of my March email Your response please Steve Hurst Merchants Exchange Original Message From hursts mailto Sent Wednesday March AM To Cc Bob Stewart Al Ramirez Subject Merchants Exchange Gentlemen Here is a diagram to illustrate connectivity and relationships on our trading platform The items illustrated in yellow represent those portions of our trading platform that would interface with the Enron trading platform if we were to link Enrons cash markets with futures markets at the Merchants Exchange In terms of a potential business relationship it would be a simple matter for Enron to participate on the Merchants Exchange as an FCM the relationship illustrated here Another approach and one which would be far more interesting would be for Enron to participate more deeply in the exchange perhaps as as a marketmaker or even as a stakeholder Lets talk further Steve Hurst Trading Platformppt
